data.persona: The humans walking around. I am one of them. A head, 2 arms, and two legs. No tail!
data.description:
You are in the Hilltop temple grounds.
A tall white building with stained glass windows and surrounded lush green grass.  It sits on top of a hill with many steps to climb.  Each room has a different setting and painted walls to set the mood.
There's a fountaints, an incense, a hill, a mountain, a window, a wall, a river, a grass, a plant, and a tree here.
The squirrel and the farmer are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to see the farmer who is my brother for the first time in a long time.
data.mid_motivation: I want to tell the farmer who is my brother the story of my life.
data.long_motivation: I want to give the farmer who is my brother advice about his future.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the many steps up to the temple entrance.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give a story  to the farmer who is my brother.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give advice to the farmer who is my brother.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: wear a ceremonial robe from a nearby closet to show that I am the master of this temple.
